_header: God through Thy might and Thy mercy
Title(s): John the Reeve and the King
_description: John the Reeve and the King — 916 lines in 6-line stanzas

BLAdd27879.First Lines:
God through thy might and thy mercyAll that loueth game and
                    glee…
BLAdd27879.Last Lines:
…That liued sometimes in the south west countryeIn Long
                    Edwardes dayes our king
